exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a : R x : Rbar Unable to unify "Lim (fun y : R => ?M2363 y * ?M2364 y) ?M2365 = Rbar_mult (Lim ?M2363 ?M2365) (Lim ?M2364 ?M2365)" with "Lim_seq (fun n : nat => a * f (Rbar_loc_seq x n)) = match Rbar_mult' a (Lim_seq (fun n : nat => f (Rbar_loc_seq x n))) with | Some z => z | None => 0 end".
